events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position and it looks promising.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster, focusing on software development and related skill sets.
A recruiter has been assigned to handle the candidate and will coordinate the next steps in the hiring process.
The initial screening call was completed successfully, with the candidate demonstrating strong relevant experience.
The candidate has responded promptly to the screening feedback and expressed enthusiasm for moving forward.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering panel for next week to assess coding and problem-solving skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview and performed well on all coding challenges and system design questions.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss benefits, company culture, and candidate expectations.
The HR interview concluded positively, with the candidate showing great alignment with company values.
An official offer has been proposed to the candidate including salary, stock options, and other benefits.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and requested clarification on some benefit details.
The candidate accepted the offer officially and is excited to join the engineering team soon.
The onboarding process has started with the candidate completing necessary documentation and orientation sessions.
The hiring process has been successfully closed and the candidate is now a part of the engineering team.
